alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Racine; Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:19AM CDT until July 24 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM CDT FOR EASTERN WALWORTH...RACINE AND KENOSHA COUNTIES... At 319 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wind Lake to Genoa City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kenosha, Racine, Mount Pleasant, Pleasant Prairie, Lake Geneva, Sturtevant, Union Grove, Paddock Lake, Williams Bay, Camp Lake, Wind Lake, Twin Lakes, Rochester, Raymond, Wheatland, Yorkville, Genoa City, Walworth, Silver Lake and Wind Point. People attending Country Thunder in Twin Lakes should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
